snippet.title: Half-Life Alyx NoVR - Action Trailer #1
snippet.description:
This is the first Action Trailer for the Half-Life Alyx NoVR mod!  Alyx is on a dangerous trek through some of the riskiest parts of City 17! Experience the story for yourself from beginning to end with our NoVR mod!

**Available now and for free!**
(Requires a copy of Half-Life Alyx)

**Download links are in our YouTube profile!**

Half-Life Alyx NoVR is the easiest to use, most flexible and most complete released mod for Half-Life Alyx that allows you to play it entirely without the need for a VR headset.  The controls, mechanics, gunplay and more have been inspired by Half-Life 2, providing a familiar and accessible experience for all Half-Life fans around the world!
